quotes.quote: The richest people in the world look for and build networks, everyone else looks for work.
It's all about people. It's about networking and being nice to people and not burning any bridges.
The currency of real networking is not greed but generosity.
It isn't just what you know, and it isn't just who you know. It's actually who you know, who knows you, and what you do for a living.
The successful networkers I know, the ones receiving tons of referrals and feeling truly happy about themselves, continually put the other person's needs ahead of their own.
Network marketing gives people the opportunity, with very low risk and very low financial commitment, to build their own income-generating asset and acquire great wealth.
Network marketing is the fastest growing business model in the world today.

Network marketing is based purely on relationship selling, which is the state of the art in selling today. Small and large companies throughout the country and the world are realizing that individuals selling to their friends and associates is the future of sales, because the critical element in buying is trust.
Nothing happens until somebody sells something!
If you want 1 year of prosperity, grow grain. If you want 10 years of prosperity, grow trees. If you want 100 years of prosperity, grow people.

If you are a person with big dreams and would love to support others in achieving their big dreams, then the network marketing business is definitely a business for you. You can start your business part-time at first and then as your business grows, you can help other people start their part-time business. This is a value worth having â€“ a business and people who help others make their dreams come true.
Network marketing is the big wave of the future. It's taking the place of franchising, which now requires too much capital for the average person.
Network Marketing is an equal opportunity opportunity.
You only win when you help others win.
In Network Marketing, duplication is what success looks like!
It's not about finding great people, it's about becoming a great person.
In Network marketing, the people who attract, train and motivate the most sales people earn the most money.
If you are doing the business right, you never have to look for strangers.
You can get everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.
Network marketing is not a social club, it is a business. Yes, the social aspects of the business are awesome, and you will make a lot of new, interesting friends.
There is a day you get into network marketing, but nothing happens until the day network marketing gets into you.
What you sow, you reap. It's a law of nature. Network Marketing is perfectly aligned with that. You get truly, exactly what you're worth! No nepotism, no favoritism. That's rare today.

People don't trust conglomerates; they trust individuals. Network marketing brings trust and the quality of the relationship to the center of the business. And it enables you to expand indefinitely, simply by expanding the number of relationships.
In Network Marketing, the NETWORKING always comes before the MARKETING.
Network marketing is really the greatest source of grass-roots capitalism, because it teaches people how to take a small bit of capital, that is your time, and build the American dream.

Too many people quit just before payday in this industry. Â You gotta have a dream and you must not let anyone steal it from you. Â You can't ride two horses at the same time. Â Get in, give it all you've got for 2-3 years and you will succeed!
Success in this industry is not in finding the right person, but in becoming the right person.
Everyone is business minded until it's time to be open minded about business.
Networking isn't how many people you know, it's how many people know you.
A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
